VIN.description: Vehicle identification number of the vehicle sending the log

operationMode.description: The current safety mode in use. Allowed values: 0 = normal operation, 1 = max speed 10 km/h, 2 = emergency braking

gnssStatus.description: Status of the GNSS localization. Allowed values: 0 = normal operation and 1 = GNSS failure.

latitude.description: The vehicle's GNSS latitude: -90 to 90 degrees

longitude.description: The vehicle's GNSS longitude: -180 to 180 degrees

riskLevel.description: The detected risk mode by the Self Assessment Module (ID04)
